title: Platform Economic Security
content: Technology is no longer just business; it is economic security. When we look at major platforms, we must consider the implications of data sovereignty and national competitiveness. Losing control of a dominant platform is akin to losing digital territory.

title: Software Education
content: The essence of software education is not just coding skills, but problem-solving capability. We need to train students to see the architecture behind the code and understand the societal impact of the systems they build.

title: AI and Practicality
content: AI hype is high, but we must look at practical applications. How does this technology actually improve productivity? We should move beyond the 'wow' factor and focus on sustainable business models.
